articles.author: Yun Li, Christina Cheddar Berk, Alex Harring
articles.title: Buffett still believes in American exceptionalism - Follow Berkshire annual meeting moments here - CNBC
articles.description: Berkshire Hathaway Chairman and CEO Warren Buffett will preside over the company's annual meeting. Track all of the day's news and analysis here.
articles.content:
Ahead of Buffett's address, shareholders are wondering what he'll have to say about President Donald Trump's tariff plans.
Trump's levies have been top of mind for investors as the market has whipsa… [+1581 chars]
